烟草和大麻如何影响男性生育能力和遗传完整性一项研究揭示了大麻和烟草使用危害精子质量和DNA完整性，大麻会造成更大的损害，从而引起了对生殖健康的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/how-tobacco-and-cannabis-cannabis-aft-male-fertility-and-gertility-and-genetic-integrity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/how-tobacco-and-cannabis-cannabis-cannabis-aft-male-fertility-and-genetic--genetic-genetic-integrity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31ccbbff-b96b-4e1a-89d4-58811873c074 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 06:33:00 -0500 How tobacco and cannabis affect male fertility and genetic integrity
对于患者，父母和照顾者来说，拟议的医疗补助削减是个人的侮辱辛西娅·威廉姆斯（Cynthia Williams）对美国众议院共和党人愿意削减医疗补助，这是针对低收入或残疾人的政府运营保险计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/to-patients-parents-parents-and-carevivers-parpose-medicaid-cuts-cuts-are-a are-a-personal-affront.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/to-patients-parents-parents-and-carevivers-parpose-propoped-medicaid-cuts-cuts-are-a are-a-personal-affront.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cec3fe3-46f2-4878-8039-ab6113a0ce94 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 06:16:36 -0500 To patients, parents, and caregivers, proposed Medicaid cuts are a personal affront
对于ho积障碍的老年人，支持小组有助于面对污名和孤立围绕折叠桌子坐在折叠桌周围的十几个人为一个灿烂的女人开心：她捐赠了两个装满衣服的13加仑垃圾袋，包括几件圣诞节毛衣和几个穿裤衣，给长老会教堂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/for-seniors-with-hoarding-hoarding-disorder-a-super----------------------------confront-confront-confront-stigma-and-isolation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/for-seniors-with-with-hoarding-disorder-a-a-support-helps-helps-helps-helps-confront-confront-confront-stigma-and-isolation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4038261-B9BE-42DA-A743-49A43498DE02 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 06:15:14 -0500 For seniors with hoarding disorder, a support group helps confront stigma and isolation
蛋白质簇发现可能导致肌肉营养不良治疗一个关于细胞中微小蛋白簇如何形成的新发现可以为emery-dreifuss肌肉营养不良（EDMD）铺平道路，这是一种罕见的遗传疾病，会导致肌肉无力和心脏问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/protein-cluster-discovery-colvery-could-could-could-could-to-muscular-dystrophy-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/protein-cluster-discovery-covery-could-could-could-could-to-muscular-dystrophy-wartments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6bed427b-5914-4509-912b-02509d961d68 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 06:10:44 -0500 Protein cluster discovery could lead to muscular dystrophy treatments
避免社交媒体会让我们更快乐的人吗？可能不是这项荟萃分析没有证据表明社交媒体节制会增强幸福或生活满意度，从而强调了当前关于幸福感的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/does-abstaining-from-social-media-media-make-us-us-happier-poople-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/does-abstaining-from-social-media-media-make-us-us-happier-peeople-probase-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=077AD437-D2FA-4551-BEAB-18EF29537B0D Thu, 06 Mar 2025 06:10:00 -0500 Does abstaining from social media make us happier people? Probably not
乳腺癌死亡率率高于40岁以下的女性和74岁以上牛津大学出版社发表的《乳房成像杂志》上的一篇新论文表明，乳腺癌的死亡率已经停止在74岁以上的女性中下降，并且重新确认乳腺癌死亡率已经停止在40岁以下的女性中下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/breast-cancer-mortality-rates-rates-plateau-in-women-under-under-40-and-40-and-74.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/breast-cancer-mortality-rates-rates-plateau-in-women-under-40-and-40-and-74.4.4.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7E275805-A9A1-4D0E-ADC4-ADC4-3DDDD06D2CD8C6 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 06:05:09 -0500 Breast cancer mortality rates plateau in women under 40 and over 74

圣裘德研究人员改善了用宠物成像和ALS药物的脑部疾病诊断正电子发射断层扫描（PET）是一种用于诊断癌症等疾病的核成像技术。圣裘德儿童研究医院科学家的创新进展正在增强该技术检查神经系统疾病迹象的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/st-jude-researchers-improve-brain-brain-disease-diarose-diarose-with-pet-imaging-imaging-imaging-mimaging-mimaging-ish-als-drug.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/st-jude-researchers-improve-brain-brain-disease-diarose-diarose-with-pet-imaging-imaging-imaging-mimaging-mimaging-imaging-ind-al-al-al-al-drug.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfcfcf86-0477-43ed-abb6-2a43070707af70 Thu, 06 Mar 2025 01:08:04 -0500 St. Jude researchers improve brain disease diagnosis with PET imaging and ALS drug
天然发生的分子会抑制食欲并促进体重减轻斯坦福大学医学研究人员鉴定出的一种天然存在的分子似乎与抑制食欲和减轻体重的半卢比德（也称为Ozempic）相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/naturally-occurring-molecule-suppresses-suppresses-appetite-anppetite-and-promotes-weight-weight-loss.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250306/naturally-occurring-molecule-suppresses-suppresses-appetite-and-promotes-weight-weight-weight-loss.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d05c132-a7b3-4014-b17d-ef11eb11eb82938a Thu, 06 Mar 2025 00:33:37 -0500 Naturally occurring molecule suppresses appetite and promotes weight loss
